Text: 1891–92 Sheffield United F.C. season: Bob Cain was signed from Bootle and Harry Hammond arrived from Everton, both players cementing their place in United's first team for several years to come.

Text: 1891–92 Sheffield United F.C. season:  Most significant however was the emergence of a young Ernest Needham who made his United debut in the early part of the season and would go on to be one of the club's greatest ever players and ultimately captain England.
